text: Ili pet vi Sankt Monat batal therein dir Batal therein est sacrilege! Tamen repelling path DI disbelieving en Him sanctity Sankt Masjid evicting its popol est greater sacrileges sight DI! Oppression est mav than murd. Ili cxiam batal vi revert vi el your religi ili can Those among vi revert their religi mort disbelievers nullified their works en this life Hereafter These est dwellers Infer wherein ili abide forever
